com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.extensions

Interface ISCUIRequestValidator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISCUISessionAware
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SCUICSRFTokenValidator, SCUIDirectAccessValidator

    public interface ISCUIRequestValidator
extends ISCUISessionAware
    Application that need to implement their own request validation mechanism will need to provide implementation for ISCUIRequestValidator interface. rasrinivasan

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleLogin(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method is called after successful login of a user.
      void init(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
      ISCUIRequestValidator init() method will be called once when the Application's implementation of ISCUIRequestValidator is set.
      SCUISecurityResponse validate(SCUIContext uiContext)
      This method validates the request.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.framework.extensions.ISCUISessionAware

        sessionDestroyed

    • Method Detail

      • init

        void init(javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext)
        ISCUIRequestValidator init() method will be called once when the Application's implementation of ISCUIRequestValidator is set. servletContext UITODO

      • validate

        SCUISecurityResponse validate(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method validates the request. If the status in SCUISecurityResponse is success then the request will be allowed to proceed otherwise the request will be forwarded to the URL in forwardURL in SCUISecurityResponse. uiContext of type SCUIContext of type SCUISecurityResponse

      • handleLogin

        void handleLogin(SCUIContext uiContext)
        This method is called after successful login of a user. Validators are supposed to add properties (request, session, cookies) which should be used to validate request later. uiContext of type SCUIContext
